name: B00-P Saves the World
description:
Humanity is in trouble! The year is 2070 and AI has almost entirely taken over. But what is this? A glimmer of hope perhaps? The tiny bot B00-P and his unstable AI friend have a plan to save the humans. It wont be easy, obstacles stand in their way but together, with the power of friendship, anything is possible.

A & D: Move left and right
Hold Space: Charge Jump
Release Space: Jump (When Charged)
Hold Shift & A or D: Charge Dash (when unlocked)
Release Shift: Dash (when charged)
Hold Space: Hover (when unlocked)
